Dragonborn

TODO rewrite from the perspective of: amethyst dragonborn noble

  • During the Dragonsurge of the Great Cataclysm, many of Aidilon's inhabitants were turned into a new generation of dragons, the descendants of which are the dragonborn race.
  • Most dragonborn can trace their ancestry back to a specific chromatic, metallic, or gem dragon matriarch of their color, and bear the knowledge of their noble heritage proudly.
  • Many gold, bronze, amethyst, sapphire, crystal, and red dragonborn hold positions of social prominence as high-ranking officials working for the dragons of their lineage, or their organizations.
